item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: We are pleased to announce the 2025 Paris Spring School in Optical Imaging and Electrophysiological Recording in Neuroscience. AKA the Paris Neuro Course.The course will run 14-27 May 2025.https://parisneuro.ovh/Please boost (with apologies for duplicates).

item.title: Mark Humphries
item.description:
Save the date!

UK Neural Computation 2025 will be at Imperial College London
9 July: ECR day
10-11 July: main meeting

9 invited speakers, 4 talks from abstracts and many posters

Abstract & registration opening soon

Pls share!

https://neuralcomputation.ukImperial College organisers: Danyal Akarca & @neuralreckoning

item.title: Nonya Bidniss :CIAverified:
item.description: As a hiring manager in the Federal government I never hired anyone who was not the most qualified for the job. I was never, ever told by HR that I had to hire based on skin color, ethnicity, or gender, or any other thing besides my assessment of their qualifications based on their resume and interview. The premises of the right wing's #DEI arguments are 100% false. There is some cronyism in govt, I've seen it and it pisses most people off. I'm not claiming it doesn't happen. But in MOST cases, people who are hired were the best for the job. And the white guys simply don't like it when it wasn't them. They don't like it when they didn't have a pal who could secretly direct hire them into a job, the way they've been trained to expect. The executive order to put DEI program personnel on paid leave with a plan to fire them in the near future primarily does one thing: it pushes out of the government a group of employees who happen to be largely POC and women. #fascism #USPol

item.title: J√°n Bog√°r
item.description: More than 100 000 people joined protests all over Slovakia (population 5.5milion) against pro-russian stances of our prime minister Fico and his cabinet, as well as against corruption and blatant abuse of power.Protests were determined, yet completely calm and non-violent, in contrast with Fico's attempts to terrify the public with fabricated suspicions of coup and foreign involvement (there was not any)).Fico's position is weaker every day.#SlovakPolitics #slovakia #politics

item.title: Antifa International
item.description: HAPPY ERIC CANTONA DAY!Today marks the 30th anniversary of the Manchester United vs. Crystal Palace match during which Man Utd. star Eric Cantona responded to a sieg heiling National Front/British National party supporter Matthew Simmons' racial abuse with a flying kick!Asked about the incident two decades later, Cantona said ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt punch him strong enough. I should have punched him harder.‚ÄùStill¬†a dedicated humanitarian and anti-racist,¬†Cantona has personally housed and feed a refugee family in his own home for two years.To celebrate this momentous anniversary, we have printed a limited run of this image as stickers and we'll send you a pack of 30 in exchange for a donation to The International Anti-Fascist Defence Fund! DM us for details!#EricCantona, #KingEric, #ManchesterUnited, #KickRacismOutOfRacists

item.title: Jan Wildeboer üò∑:krulorange:
item.description: In the Netherlands #Signal is at the top of app stores. Seems a critical mass has been reached and groups (families, communities of practice) are now willing to make the switch. Good! (Source: https://signalapp.nl/signal-app-nieuws/nederland-neemt-voortouw-in-overstap-naar-signal-wereldwijd-in-top-10/ AKA @AboutSignalNL )

item.title: David Njoku
item.description: "Freed Israeli soldiers reunited with families as Israel releases 200 Palestinian prisoners"... who, I'm guessing, didn't have families? Western media are biased in ways so subtle that sometimes even they don't see it. #gaza

item.title: Eugen Rochko
item.description: I always struggle to pay attention to the metrics, but it looks like #Mastodon for Android downloads are up 455% recently. This tracks with how many new people I've been seeing on the explore page recently. Don't know if it's a coincidence but I think your help in fixing our app's rating might have had a hand in this...
